name: Eddie Griffin
summary: Eddie Griffin. Actor: Undercover Brother. Eddie Griffin was born on 15 July 1968 in Kansas City, Missouri, USA. He is an actor and producer, known for Undercover Brother (2002), Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo (1999) and John Q (2002).
